ing: 1 (15 ounce) can mackerel, drained and rinsed
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Savory and spicy, this mayo-based dip is made with canned mackerel."
ins: Remove skin and bones from fish. In a medium bowl, mix fish with onion and hot pepper sauce with a fork, breaking fish into small pieces. Mix in mayonnaise. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover, and refrigerate for 2 hours.
